topics.body:
Alright final review of Psyren.
It's good. Not bad but not spectacular in any way. The use of psychic powers was interesting and the mystery of Psyren were compelling and the action scenes were well drawn and well paced. The characters  were by far the weakest part. It spent so much time focusing on the mystery and action that the characters felt kind of boring. Hell a few of the most important characters just disappear for like 50 chapters. So am I disappointed that I read it? No. Would I read it again? Probably not.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
